page.title: 08Nurseries 3
page.content: They have also kept pigs which later caught{swine fever}.With so many nurseries around it is a fight for survival.They have to adapt and modernize in order to win through. {South Sway Orchards}grow strawberries, gooseberries and other fruits and advertise a "Pick Your Own" policy which is gaining in popularity. Hired labour is saved and a lower price offered to the customer.{ {Hollins Nursery}near the Wheel Inn, state that they grow all their own plants}and{shrubs}and pointed out the difference between a nursery and a garden centre. A garden centre buys all the plants and does not grow them. {Lymington Plant Centre} in Pitmore Lane offers the largest variety of plants and 350 different shrubs. However all plants are bought in.Roses are their best seller.
